(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 6, col = 20)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 20)

The avatar is at (6, 20). The citizens spawn at (12, 0) and the output is at (12, 31). There are demons at (1, 6), (1, 29), and angels at (1, 15), (1, 24). The goal is to get the citizens to the output without them becoming cursed. I need to move down to interact with the citizens and guide them to the right while avoiding the demons.
Action: 3
I'm moving down to be closer to the citizens' spawn point.
